### Genetic Architecture of Adaptation

* Uses existing GWAS and demographic model.
* Build CNN to predict parameters of an optimum shift model [Stetter 2018](https://journals.plos.org/plosgenetics/article/comments?id=10.1371/journal.pgen.1007794)

### Estimate migration surface for maize Mexico

* Uses [SEEDs]Gates](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/706739v1) data of ~2500 landraces in Mexico
* Run [Petkova 2016](https://www.nature.com/articles/ng.3464) or similar methods

### Recent bottlenecks due to European contact

* Uses landrace data from C2 (unpublished) or other samples
* [IBD](https://journals.plos.org/plosgenetics/article?id=10.1371/journal.pgen.1007385) or other approaches to identify recent bottleneck

### Geographic distribution of incompatibility loci

* Uses public data on teosintes from [Swarts et al](https://science.sciencemag.org/content/357/6350/512.abstract) and [SEEDs]Gates](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/706739v1)
* Align to published cloned sequences of [tcb1](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-019-10259-0) and [ga1 female](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5684833/) and [ga1 male](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6131150/)

### Dating everything

* Uses [Albers](https://journals.plos.org/plosbiology/article?id=10.1371/journal.pbio.3000586) to build model to date SNPs
* Estimate age of lots of cool SNPs -- tga1, etc.
